front.title: Transporting WebDAV-Related Event Notifications over the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP)

abstract.t: This memo describes a method for notifying interested parties aboutWebDAV-related events (such as PUTs and DELETEs), where suchnotifications are delivered via an extension to the ExtensibleMessaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) for publish-subscribefunctionality.
